website_summaries.verdict: Small tablets without soy, GMOs, or gluten containing RDA of vitamin D.
pros: Contains no gluten, soy, wheat, or nuts
Made in USA at FDA cGMP Registered Facility to ensure quality product
USDA Certified Organic from a trusted manufacturer that has been around since 1960
cons: Some buyers didn't like the corn syrup and corn maltodextrin ingredients in the filler for the tablets
A few people had stomach upset after taking this supplement

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!!
customer_reviews.text: My family has been on this vitamin since many months finished 2 bottles and they recently had blood work done checked vitamin D levels.. all my family results came back very low .. this product is horrible actually doesn’t work.. I will never buy this again I bought it because I read the product reviews are good. I m so upset
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Read Ingredients!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in December. I didn't open, or use this product because I didn't happen to notice the ingredients until we received the package. It is organic, but it's full of junk ingredients. Corn syrup has no business in our food or supplements. Very disappointed to say the least. I will try to return product, as we will not use it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney C

customer_reviews.title: WARNING FOR CROHN'S PATIENTS: FULL OF TRIGGER INGREDIENTS
customer_reviews.text: Full of TRIGGER ingredients ... potato starch, corn syrup solids, tapioca, sunflower, palm oil, etc. WHY OH DEAR GOD WHY formulate pills w/ trigger ingredients when the need is for people who likely suffer malabsorption syndromes such as inflammatory bowel disease, Crohn's or refractory sprue?
customer_reviews.author: Leebert

customer_reviews.title: The Pictured Supplement Facts and Ingredients on the Bottle are Wrong
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Vitamin D under the impression that it had NO OIL in it. The picture of the bottle ingredients on the posting are missing several items that are printed on the bottle that I received: Organic Tapioca Maltodextrin, Organic Sunflower Lecithin, Organic Palm Oil, and Organic Guar Gum. This is unacceptable, as I eat an oil free diet. If the listing was correct I would not have purchased this product. I'll be returning this asap.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Jenney

customer_reviews.title: Bad Ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: WHY does this need corn syrup and palm oil.... so sad and so unhealthy for a vitamin of all things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Corn syrup solids ????!
customer_reviews.text: Took one yesterday. Idk if I’m going to keep taking it. I didn’t see that it was made of corn syrup solids etc. I saw the good rating but didn’t look at the one star reviews. I wouldn’t have ordered it if I would have seen that first.
customer_reviews.author: Ecila O.

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin D as prescribed
customer_reviews.text: Can't really judge a vitamin as to it's effectiveness. If my doctor says my vitamin D level is OK, then I can assume it is working. I liked that the expiration date was more than a year away, as there are 360 pills and I expect them to last that long. I wrote a positive review of the seller.
customer_reviews.author: MissT

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product did exactly as it was designed to do. My doctor directed me to take a vitamin D supplement to boost my vitamin D levels. When my blood was checked recently, the vitamin D level was much improved. In fact it was in the proper range! I will continue to take this until my doctor tells me otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend 👍
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 42 yr old male and never really liked taking vitamins but since this COVID-19 pandemic I’ve been thinking a lot about my health. I here vitamin D is good for helping build a strong immune system and other health benefits. Literally after a few days I could feel the difference. Easy to swallow pill. I feel better and different even mentally. I feel stress levels drop, better sleep at night and stronger immune system. If your looking to improve health I recommend taking vitamin D3👍💯
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: NO GELATIN
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pill with no gelatin for a muslim friend of mine. This pill is organic, and has no gelatin. It is 2000 IU which many doctors recommend taking daily for certain patients. Consult your doctor before taking this vitamin. I recommend it for those who are looking for a Vitamin D pill with no gelatin.
customer_reviews.author: Fabritzio Fineburg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow but awful on stomach
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, after taking this supplement my sleep has been horrible. So I stopped taking them then I was able to sleep. I was only taking one. Hmmmm. I wish I can replaced with a different brand. Not happy....I’m sorry for bad reviews....not gentle on stomach because it contain maltodextrin
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R. Waters

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Good amount of pills for the price, but I wasn't aware of the iffy ingredients when I purchased it. Ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: beautifulmonster1318

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate reaction
customer_reviews.text: In the past I took Solgar. I looked at switching due to good reviews and cost savings however this product wreaked havoc on my stomach. I gave it multiple tries think that it could be a conflic with something else I was eating but again the same thing happened. Will be going back to Solgar
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non-GMO, No Gluten, Certified Organtic
customer_reviews.text: Received as promised in good shape. The pills are smaller than I thought making them easy to swallow. They say all ingredients are organic. I’ve never used product from Bronson so I can’t judge the effectiveness yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C

customer_reviews.title: TOO MANY ADDITIVES
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice until I received the bottle today that this product is crammed with unhealthy additives hidden behind the word ORGANIC such as corn syrup, potato starch, rice bran, tapioca, and palm oil! With all these starches, how is there any room for Vitamin D? Know wonder it's so cheap. Very disappointed. I'm returning ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Boone

customer_reviews.title: No unwanted after effects
customer_reviews.text: During the winter months where we don't see as much sunshine, I felt I needed a Vitamine D boost. I have allergies and have to be concerned about the ingredients in any medication or OTC supplements. So far, I've had no problems with this product and very pleased. The tablets are small and easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: amanda1

customer_reviews.title: Good if you like organic
customer_reviews.text: I liked that these pills were organic and didn't have a lot of fillers, but I wished they were capsules rather than pressed pills. I have been taking vitamin D for years so I didn't notice a difference between them and others I've taken in the past, but again, I liked the organic ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: ElaineL

customer_reviews.title: CORN SYRUP SOLIDS/PALM OIL/CRAP
customer_reviews.text: CRAP. It's got corn syrup solids and palm oil?!? Wtf?? So it's crappy for me and the freaking orangutans?! can you just give us the vitamin D3?!?
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: best for the budget
customer_reviews.text: These are the best quality and the best amount I can get for my budget. I've been taking these for about 2 years with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow, no taste
customer_reviews.text: The pills are about 25% larger than an aspirin but easy to swallow. Some pills taste awful but these leave no taste on my tongue after sitting there for 5 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Hartful

customer_reviews.title: Good source of Vit D
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good source of Vit D. My husband takes this one and I use an organic plant-based one. This is from lanolin so just be aware of that. It still good quality
customer_reviews.author: Colleen D

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine. No aftertaste.
customer_reviews.text: This works as expected, as far as I know. Gives me piece of mind to up my Vit D. This was a good price for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dyna L. Harris

customer_reviews.title: I won’t be buying more!
customer_reviews.text: At the first hint of humidity these melt into a glob. They got stuck to the bottom of my pill case. What a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Felt better after taking this supplement I would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M****Z

customer_reviews.title: Organic vitamin D3
customer_reviews.text: Amazing you can get this many tablets for the price- the best organic vitamin D3!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: This product has potato starch
customer_reviews.text: I gave this review because I can not use the product. Wish there was a different way to mark. I missed the ingredient potato starch.
customer_reviews.author: gramma grace

customer_reviews.title: A Gift for someone else
customer_reviews.text: The person I gave it to loves it and really likes the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro J. Veralli

customer_reviews.title: Filled my requirements better than products in local stores
customer_reviews.text: Vitamin D3 2,000 IU wasn't available in local stores, these are exactly what I'm required to take. Small tablet that's easy enough to swallow., no discernable flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lupinacci

customer_reviews.title: Taste bad too chalky to bad you cant test for organic
customer_reviews.text: Very chalky tasting, if this is organic no way. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Miller-Zell

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: We needed vitamin D3 and I have no side affects from this product.

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly!
customer_reviews.text: My bloodwork came back with a low Vit D level. After 30 days it was completely in range .

customer_reviews.title: Moisture Damage?
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to check your supplements when you buy them, it was too late for me to return and the manufacturer thinks it’s moisture damage. Im giving 3 stars because they have good customer service

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value , great packaging shipped fast and packed great .

customer_reviews.title: Too many tablets
customer_reviews.text: I should have gotten a smaller quantity because moisture gets in the bottle before tablets get used up...

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: I only received half of the 360 tablets Paid god. I think the company is a reliable source of supply.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Additives!
customer_reviews.text: VERY disappointing! Who ever heard of Corn Syrup & other Additives in an " organic product?" Definitely pharma grade as it says. Don't bother, chem vitamin! I want to return it!!!

customer_reviews.title: good!
customer_reviews.text: so far no complaints. Been about a month or so. Its eorth the money!

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this, my vit d level is now normal. will purchase again!

I wanted something that would be absorbed and not pass through. My last physical showed that my Vitamin D was within the desired limits. YEAH!

customer_reviews.text: Did not have fillers as their vitmain C did....... this produced worked for my tiredness because viti due to it being very low it raised level in a short period of time .

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this brand is wonderful if your Dr said to take it
customer_reviews.text: Be careful and talk to your Dr before you take supplements. I took one tablet and thought I was going to have a heart attack. Apparently magnesium can cause heart palpitations. I'm sure this brand is wonderful if your Dr said to take it. Get the dosage right too or you could harm yourself by accident. Supplements shouldn't be taken for no reason because you read some place on the internet that they are good for you. I learned that the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: cStrein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Price, 360 2000 IU Organic USDA vegetable ingredient ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Price, 360 2000 IU Organic USDA vegetable ingredient tablets, can't beat it, will be buying more Bronson products in the future more than likely.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, tested my Vitamin D3 levels and they are great now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Great!
customer_reviews.text: These tablets, in the dosage my physician requested, are a great size, not a pill that would choke a horse. Fairly priced, packaged well, and delivered on time. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jsouthbird

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.text: For medical/cancer reasons I've been taking this product to improve my overall health. I cannot refer to any studies or such that may promote this product, but I can say that it as affected my PSA in a positive direction (based on statistical data and facts, not opinion). Because this type of supplements is considered quackery in the established medical community (despite my having Excel charts challenging such), I'm torn regarding this review. The best I can say is "Do what is right for you, and forget everyone else. Because, after all, YOU will be the one who comes to recognize the choice (or choices) you've made, and now must live it." I'm happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Critical

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins are vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I just received them today and will begin taking them tomorrow. Vitamins are Vitamins--what can I say?!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product exactly as described and exactly what I needed as per my doctor! Will purchase again!

customer_reviews.title: Eassential vitamins to help keep the flu away
customer_reviews.text: As vitamin D & sunshine is essential for the flu season & to beat it, I highly recommend this brand! It helps in many ways. Will keep ordering :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am returning that product because it is not non-GMO even though it is listed as non-GMO.
customer_reviews.author: Cihat Akviranli

customer_reviews.title: More energy after just a week!!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely felt like I had more energy after taking these daily for just a week! I am, however, getting more Calcium deposits on my face which I read can be due to taking too much Vit D, so I’m going to cut back to every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: The expiration date is good. 2
customer_reviews.text: 1. The expiration date is good. 2. 360 servings is good for 1 year use. 3. Sealed with cotton inside.
customer_reviews.author: Goldeneye

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I'm very deficient in D per Dr. blood tests. He didn't recommend a brand, just units. Following year after taking this and a new blood test, D was perfect. It's effective. Lots of vitamins are BS, this one is legit. There's no gelatin for us vegetarians ( for vegans the source is sheep wool... but at least no bones, and got to draw a line somewhere for personal health) and the pills are mostly easy to swallow. Mostly, as in they are small but a tad sticky since no gelatin film. Won't lie, gaged a few times, but that's one me. About the size of an Advil. Shouldn't bother most if wash them down fast before stick.
customer_reviews.author: Waltor

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - Read ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I would’ve read the ingredients before ordering. It has maltodextrin and corn syrup. The website is allowing me to return but charging a return shipping fee of $6 and then of course I have to get something to put it in to ship. After all that it won’t even be worth returning. So these will go into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: TheGratefulMom

customer_reviews.title: Small tablets, ez to swallow, chewing is an acceptable alternative, though not tasty. Reasonable price for 360 (2000UI) tablets
customer_reviews.text: They're pills, they're small, they're easy to swallow, although chewing is an acceptable alternative if swallowing is difficult. They do not have added, "pleasant" flavoring, but the taste is not terrible, either, not harsh or bitter, just rather bland with a bit of an after taste. I ordered these because the price is more reasonable than the brand I had been getting, and these are delivered right to my door. The previous brand's tablets were flavored chewables and tasted much better, but, for the difference in price, I'm willing to make that compromise.
customer_reviews.author: krenTop Contributor: Aquascaping

customer_reviews.title: Look at the ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Why add so many undocumented ingredients to a simple D3 dose? Bronson is trying to re-invent simple gel-caps of vitamin D3. Bronson is proud of everything listed as organic but hey, who wants or needs these extra "filler" ingredients? ... READ the ingredients. These pills don't swallow easily either, I prefer D3 gel caps .
customer_reviews.author: Katy B.

customer_reviews.title: After about 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Well my vitamin levels were really low after crashing and getting major side effects from another medication, and this helped me get back to normal vitamin d levels within months! You may not feel much initially but I heard from a doctor that it can take around 4 months for vitamin d to have a positive impact on your mood and this really helped!
customer_reviews.author: Underground Tech

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t taken it yet so I can’t speak to the flavor, absorption and ease of swallowing. However, I was very disappointed in the ingredients. I’ve learned a lesson from this experience. Just because a product has organic ingredients it doesn’t mean the ingredyare good for you. This vit D capsule has Palm oil, gum, corn syrup solids, potato starch, and more. Garden of Life brand does not have this content. Most of their ingredients are from vegetables
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Kubinyi

customer_reviews.title: 2000IU - newer smaller pills/package.
customer_reviews.text: I like these just fine - good price. But they seem to have changed the product size. The old bottle purchased about a year ago was larger, as were the pills. They are both labeled as qty 360, 2000IU but the older one specifies 500%DV - the newer one specifies 250%DV.
customer_reviews.author: W. Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Organic but why does it have corn syrup, & other fillers?
customer_reviews.text: I initially wanted to give 5 stars because I was super excited that it was an organic Vitamin D3. However, I decided to read the ingredients and of course was shacked to how much extra stuff it had! I really need to know why it has: corn maltodextrin, potato starch, corn syrup, palm oil, guar gum? Please someone explain it to me.

customer_reviews.text: I have so much trouble finding a 2000 unit tablet. Usually, all I can find it a soft-gel. This is great because now I can just take 1 pill a day and have enough for a year. I will be buying this again next year.

product_meta.title: Bronson Vitamin D3 2,000 IU (1 Year Supply) for Immune Support, Healthy Muscle Function & Bone Health, High Potency Organic Non-GMO Vitamin D Supplement, 360 Tablets
feature_bullets: USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC VITAMIN D: Only products with USDA Certified Organic logo are truly organic!
PHARMACEUTICAL GRADE, LABORATORY TESTED: This Vitamin D3 contains the same Biological form of vitamin D produced by your body. GLUTEN FREE, SOY FREE, WHEAT FREE and NUT FREE. NON-GMO.
THE SUNSHINE VITAMIN: Helps to support teeth and bone health, provide immune support, and promote healthy muscle function.*

TRUSTED SINCE 1960: The pioneers of Bronson Vitamins were a group of pharmacists who witnessed the benefits of vitamins and mineral supplementation firsthand with their patients. Bronson Vitamins have been consistently mentioned by top medical professionals since our inception in 1960.
